page.title: 08PUBLIC TRANSPORT.
page.content: {BUSES:}In squares 04480273,04480274, 0448275 & 0449275 run these Midland Red South buses.RUGBY TOWN SERVICES: Rugby Town Centre to Bilton . The Brownsover Estate Circular. The Shakespeare Gardens Circular. INTER-TOWN SERVICES. Rugby to Coventry, via Bilton,Stretton -On-Dunsmore and Ryton:Or via Wolston and Ryton:Or via Long Lawford and Wolston,starting in Hillmorton(at either Lennon Close or Lower Hillmorton Road):Or starting in Northampton. Rugby to Princethorpe to Leamington. {TRAINS:}Through squares 04480274, 0448275 & 0449275 runs the Rugby to Leamington railway line,now only open as far as Southam only;to carry materials for the cement works there. Through squares 0448275,& 0449275 runs the London to Birmingham Inter-City.
